item.title: About Our Typefaces
item.description: The smittytone’s Software Stack logo is an homage to some of the great typefaces of that increasingly distant past: the 1960s, 70s and 80s. If you’d like some background about why these typefaces in particular were selected, please take a look at this blog post. There are currently nine typefaces used, selected at random and re-selected every 20 seconds. They are: Baby Teeth Designed by Milton Glaser in the early 60s, apparently after seeing a similar design on a hand-painted sign in Mexico City.
